isPermittedImageType

public static boolean isPermittedImageType(java.lang.String suffix)
Decides if the file suffix is one of the supported image formats.

Parameters:
suffix - The suffix being tested, which should not include a "."
Returns:
true if the suffix matches one of the supported image formats.

read

public static void read(java.lang.String filePath,
                        Lattice lattice)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        java.lang.Exception
Reads an image from a file and updates the cells to contain this info. Automatically converts the image to grey scale (or appropriate colors for the view). Also scales the image to the size of the current CA lattice.

Parameters:
filePath - The path to the image that will be read.
lattice - The CA lattice.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - if cannot read the pixels in the file.
java.io.IOException - if cannot read the file.
java.lang.Exception

readToDoubleArray

public static double[] readToDoubleArray(java.lang.String filePath,
                                         int width,
                                         int height,
                                         double min,
                                         double max)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                         java.lang.Exception
Reads an image from a file and converts it to a double array of the specified size. Automatically converts the image to grey scale (or appropriate colors for the view).

Parameters:
filePath - The path to the image that will be read.
width - The width of the CA lattice.
height - The height of the CA lattice.
min - The minimum double value returned in the array (all pixels will be rescaled using this value).
max - The maximum double value returned in the array (all pixels will be rescaled using this value).
Returns:
An array of doubles representing the image, and if the image is two-dimensional, then the image[col][row] is stored in the array as array[row * width + col]. Pixels in the original image are assigned values between 0.0 (for color 0, 0, 0) and 1.0 (for color 255, 255, 255), but this method returns values rescaled between min and max.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - if cannot read the pixels in the file.
java.io.IOException - if cannot read the file.
java.lang.Exception - if max < min.

readToIntegerArray

public static int[] readToIntegerArray(java.lang.String filePath,
                                       int width,
                                       int height,
                                       int numStates)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
Reads an image from a file and converts it to an integer array of the specified size. Automatically converts the image to grey scale (or appropriate colors for the view).

Parameters:
filePath - The path to the image that will be read.
width - The width of the CA lattice.
height - The height of the CA lattice.
numStates - The number of states in the CA (assumes that it has integer states).
Returns:
An array of integers representing the image, and if the image is two-dimensional, then the image[col][row] is stored in the array as array[row * width + col].
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - if cannot read the pixels in the file.
java.io.IOException - if cannot read the file.
